text: MOBB was a South Korean hip hop sub-unit formed by YG Entertainment in 2016. The duo consisted of YG labelmates Mino from Winner and Bobby from iKon. ==History== MOBB made their debut with the release of the four-track EP The Mobb. The music video for Bobby's solo track "꽐라 (HOLUP!)" was released on September 7, 2016, and the music video for Mino's solo track "몸 (BODY)" was released on September 8. On September 9, music videos for the collaborative singles "붐벼 (FULL HOUSE)" and "빨리 전화해 (HIT ME)" were released. The duo's profile was removed from the YG Entertainment website in 2019, confirming their disbandment. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:8em;" | Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:20em;" | Details ! colspan="5" | Peak chart positions ! rowspan="2" style="width:12em;" | Sales |- ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;font-size:90%;"|KOR ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;font-size:90%;" | JPN ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;font-size:90%;"|US Heat ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;font-size:90%;"|US Rap ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;font-size:90%;"|US World |- ! scope="row" | The MOBB | * Released: September 8, 2016 (KOR) * Label: YG Entertainment, YGEX * Formats: CD, digital download | 2 || 7 || 7 || 20 || 1 | *KOR: 31,744 *JPN: 14,8551,418 (Korean edition) + 13,437 (Japanese Edition) * * |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:18em;"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="2"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Sales ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- ! scope="col" style="width:3.5em;font-size:90%;"|KOR * * ! scope="col" style="width:3.5em;font-size:90%;"|US World * * |- ! scope="row" |"HOLUP!"
